recipe.title: Chopped Chicken Caesar Sammies
ingredients: 1 pound cooked, chopped skinless chicken breasts
3 ciabatta sandwich rolls (about 4 ounces each), split
instructions: In a bowl, whisk mayonnaise, oil, Parmesan, juice, mustard, Worcestershire and anchovy paste. Add chicken; toss to coat. Divide chicken, tomato and romaine among rolls. Cut sandwiches in half.
